overview: In this second installment of "That's Life" Marcel cashes in a winning lottery ticket. Thanks to his luck he discovers Bora-Bora accompanied by an exuberant millionairess living off her investments. Shortly afterwards, however, he is cheated by a beautiful and perverse blond (Katja Kean) who, with her friends, robs him of his fortune. "That's Life 2" is an ambitious project undet the direction of Pierre Woodman. Discover Bora-Bora with Private.
title: That'$ Life 2
